ca: **This bandplan is incomplete**; some bands, like 630m, are simply not present. It also does not cover any band above 30MHz.
it_hf: HF amateur radio bands in Italy
it_vhf: VHF/UHF amateur radio bands in Italy
it_shf: UHF/SHF amateur radio bands in Italy
jp: Pending checks against the latest update from the 総務省 (MIC) of Japan, March 2020
mx: Full radio allocations chart for all services. No information specific to amateur radio is shown.
Secretaría de Comunicaciones y Transportes (SCT) / Instituto Federal de Telecomunicaciones (IFT)
nl: Amateur radio bands in the Netherlands
